name: Short Stack (BETA)
description:
This is the first build of my arcade platformer, Short Stack.  Made in 3 days in Pixel Game Maker MV.

It has one level, and functioning game loops for winning, losing lives, and game overing after 3 lost lives.

Features to come on next build.

  • Sound and music
  • Multiple levels
  • Enemy re-spawns
  • Level timers
